Entries.5295001/e 5295000/o Shane/t 600 2300/H: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 MisterGinger 64 18 0/broadcastEvent/pause 1500/speak MisterGinger "Good morning, @. And what a glorious morning it is.#$b#Everything's so much more colorful now!$1"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Anyway, I dropped by to say 'thanks'.#$b#And also to let you know that I'm headed into Zuzu today, to get some stuff sorted."/pause 300/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/speak MisterGinger "It appears that I made some fairly sound investment decisions before... well, before everything.#$b#And I've found myself a nice den in East Scarpe.#$b#You could come visit me tomorrow... you know, if you like?$3"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Anyway, see you around."/end invisible MisterGinger
Entries.5295016/e 5295000/e 5295001/O Shane/t 60: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 MisterGinger 64 18 0/broadcastEvent/pause 1500/speak MisterGinger "Good morning, @.I've come to offer my congratulations! I hear someone around here has got themselves hitched!$1#$b#Congratulations to you both.[113]#$b#What? You don't like my gift? Well, my other option was wine, so... I think you can see why this is better."/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Anyway, now Shane's made himself cosy on your farm, I'll be taking over his old room."/pause 300/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/speak MisterGinger "Oh, I'm headed into Zuzu today too, got some things to get settled, but feel free to visit tomorrow!$3"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Anyway, see you around."/end invisible MisterGinger

Entries.Jas_Letter: Dear farmer @,^We are practicing letter writing with Miss Penny. Today I chose to write to you. I hope all is good on your farm and wish you a very happy day!^^Kind regards,^Jas^^PS: I hope you like this letter, please tell Miss Penny that I did a good job. :)^PSS: Mr Ginger says 'hi'[#]A letter from Jas
Entries.Tristan_BakedFishGift: Hey @,^I need your help. I'm absolutely rubbish at cooking and I want to surprise someone.^Can you rustle me up a platter of baked fish?^Meet me on the pier at noon.^^Please and thank you!^Triss[#]Tristan wants fish
Entries.Tristan_MtEvermore: Hey @, want to join me on an adventure? I've always wanted to watch the sunset from the top of Mt. Evermore, and I'd love someone to keep me out of trouble.^If it's a 'yes', meet me by the stone bridge am hour before sunset and wear good walking shoes!^Yours, Tristan.[#]Invite to Mt Evermore

Entries.Wizard_CatPicnic: Greetings young adept,^ Our mutual friend requests your presence before the gaze of Old Man Cannoli, after the fall of darkness.^  M. Rasmodius, Wizard.[#]An Invitation
Hello, dear!^ Our mutual friend requests your presence before the gaze of Old Man Cannoli, after the fall of darkness.^  .[#]An Invitation

Entries.50706129/n Wizard_CatPicnic/Hl Tristan_R: woodsTheme/-100 -100/farmer 16 13 3 MisterGinger 8 8 0/skippable/addTemporaryActor MrGPicnicRug 48 48 8 10 2 false/addLantern 735 10 7 4/viewport 14 13/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Hey old stone guy? Is this it. Is it finally it?$2#$b#Oh, what if it works? What if it doesn't?$2#$b#Pah, what do you know? You're just a big blockhead."/pause 250/move farmer -2 0 3/playSound woodyStep/pause 250/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/jump MisterGinger 3/pause 250/textAboveHead MisterGinger "You're here!"/speed MisterGinger 4/move MisterGinger 3 0 1/speed MisterGinger 4/move MisterGinger 0 5 1/move farmer -2 0 3/pause 250/emote farmer 32/speak MisterGinger "I wasn't sure you'd come. I mean..."/pause 250/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/pause 250/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "...well, I'm a cat.#$b#Obviously, we're a superior species, but, oh... nevermind.$3#$b#Anyway, come on. I made you supper.$4"/pause 500/move MisterGinger -3 0 0/move farmer -3 0 0/move MisterGinger 0 -1 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "What do you think?"/pause 500/quickQuestion #That's actually really impressive!#It looks delicious.#You call this a picnic?#I'm lactose intolerant.#Is this a supper for me or for you?(break)speak MisterGinger "Not bad for someone with no thumbs, right?$1#$b#I had Jas to help me.$4"(break)speak MisterGinger "I'm so pleased you like it!$3"(break)speak MisterGinger "Oh...$2#$b#Sorry if it doesn't meet your high 'human standards'.$5#$b#More for me then, I guess.$1"(break)speak MisterGinger "So am I, but it never stopped me!"(break)speak MisterGinger "True. I didn't know what you'd like, so I chose my favorite things!$1"/pause 500/stopMusic/playMusic echos/speak MisterGinger "Anyway, I invited you here because I'm sure you've realized by now that Stardew Valley is more than just a tiny valley in the middle of nowhere.#$b#It's a place where magical, wonderful things can happen.$3"/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 250/speak MisterGinger "A place, for example, where a cat might be able to speak, and possibly, even...$4"/pause 500/showFrame MisterGinger 25/pause 250/speak MisterGinger "What I'm trying to say, @, is that I consider you one of my dearest friends."/pause 250/speak MisterGinger "$q 507000000 null#And I hope you feel the same way about me too?#$r 50700000 0 MrG_Friend#I care for you too. A lot.#$r 50700001 -20 MrG_Rid#Friends with a cat? What a ridiculous notion!"/fork 50700002 MrG_Ridic/pause 500/showFrame MisterGinger 28/positionOffset farmer -4 0/specificTemporarySprite heart 8 11/pause 2000/end warpOut
Entries.MrG_Ridic: pause 500/animate MisterGinger false false 250 12 20 21 20 21/pause 2000/move MisterGinger -3 0 0/pause 1000/end warpOut

Entries.5295003/e 50706129/e 50706116/e 3900074/: jaunty/-200 -200/Jas 5 5 3 MisterGinger 4 5 1 farmer 9 18 3/addTemporaryActor MonaCute 16 16 -100 -101 2 false/addTemporaryActor TristanCute 16 16 -99 -101 2 false/addTemporaryActor WitchCute 16 32 -1000 -1000 2 false/addTemporaryActor GingerCute 16 16 -1000 -1000 2 false/addTemporaryActor JasCute 16 16 -1000 -1000 2 false/addTemporaryActor MarnShane 32 16 -1000 -1000 2 false/addTemporaryActor MarnCute 16 16 -1000 -1000 2 false/addConversationTopic Tristan_Discuss 5/skippable/viewport 5 7 clamp true/pause 500/speak Jas "... It's time we told him, isn't it Mr Ginger?^It's time we told her, isn't it Mr Ginger?"/pause 500/move farmer -3 0 0/pause 500/playSound cat/pause 500/speak Jas "I know you're worried, but it'll work, he'll believe me, I know it!^I know you're worried, but it'll work, she'll believe me, I know it!#$b#If anyone can help, it's farmer @!"/move farmer 0 -5 0/faceDirection Jas 2/pause 500/textAboveHead Jas "Shsh"/pause 1000/faceDirection Jas 3/speak Jas "(whispers) He's here now... Are you ready?$2^(whispers) She's here now... Are you ready?$2"/pause 500/playSound cat/showFrame MisterGinger 28/positionOffset Jas -12 0/pause 1000/emote MisterGinger 20/pause 1000/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/warp Jas 5 5/faceDirection Jas 2/pause 500/doAction 6 12/playSound doorOpen/move farmer 0 -5 0/pause 500/emote Jas 32/move MisterGinger 0 2 1/speak Jas "Oh, hello farmer @! I've just been writing a story for school. Do you wanna hear it?$1"/emote farmer 56/pause 500/emote Jas 32/move MisterGinger 0 -1 1/move farmer 0 -2 3/pause 500/speak Jas "It's a bit sad, isn't it Mr Ginger?"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "It is.$2#$b#But I really hope it'll have a happy ending.$4"/stopMusic/pause 500/fade/viewport -100 -98/warp MisterGinger -1000 -1000/warp Jas -1000 -1000/warp farmer -1000 -1000/speak Jas "Once upon a time, there was a man called Tristan and a woman. Her name was Mona."/pause 500/faceDirection MonaCute 1/faceDirection TristanCute 3/speak Jas "...and they really, really loved each other."/pause 500/showFrame TristanCute 16/showFrame MonaCute 16/showFrame TristanCute 17/showFrame MonaCute 17/pause 500/emote TristanCute 20/emote MonaCute 20/pause 500/speak Jas "They had heaps of adventures, and fought monsters, and were both very brave!$4"/faceDirection MonaCute 0/animate MonaCute false true 250 8 9 10 11/animate TristanCute false true 250 8 9 10 11/pause 1000/speak Jas "One day they found a very weird place. A scary place.$3"/pause 500/stopAnimation MonaCute/faceDirection MonaCute 1/stopAnimation TristanCute/faceDirection TristanCute 3/emote TristanCute 16/pause 1000/changeLocation WitchSwamp/viewport -100 -100/warp MonaCute 20 21/warp TristanCute 21 21/fade/playMusic Overcast/viewport 20 23/pause 500/faceDirection MonaCute 0/playSound stoneStep/pause 250/playSound stoneStep/textAboveHead MonaCute "Hello?"/pause 500/faceDirection MonaCute 1/textAboveHead MonaCute "No-one's home."/pause 5000/emote TristanCute 60/pause 500/textAboveHead MonaCute "I'm going in"/pause 500/faceDirection MonaCute 0/pause 500/playSound openChest/pause 1000/emote TristanCute 28/pause 1000/fade/viewport -100 -100/changeLocation WitchHut/viewport -100 -100/warp MonaCute 7 11/warp TristanCute 8 11/pause 500/fade/viewport 9 9/move MonaCute 0 -5 0/faceDirection TristanCute 1/pause 1250/faceDirection TristanCute 0/pause 1250/faceDirection TristanCute 3/pause 500/textAboveHead MonaCute "Wow!"/move MonaCute 4 0 1/pause 400/textAboveHead MonaCute "This is amazing!"/pause 1500/textAboveHead MonaCute "I wonder what happens..."/pause 250/playSound dwoop/pause 1500/playSound shadowHit/pause 500/jump TristanCute 3/textAboveHead TristanCute "What have you done?"/pause 1500/playSound cacklingWitch/pause 500/emote MonaCute 16/speed MonaCute 4/move MonaCute -4 0 2/pause 250/speed MonaCute 4/move MonaCute 0 9 2/warp MonaCute -1000 -1000/speed TristanCute 4/speed TristanCute 4/move TristanCute -1 0 2/speed TristanCute 4/move TristanCute 0 4 2/fade/viewport -100 -100/changeLocation WitchSwamp/viewport -100 -100/warp MonaCute 20 25/warp TristanCute 21 24/viewport 19 25/pause 500/playSound swordswipe/warp WitchCute 20 21/faceDirection MonaCute 0/faceDirection TristanCute 0/pause 500/shake MonaCute 250/jump TristanCute 3/textAboveHead WitchCute "Meddling fools!"/pause 500/showFrame TristanCute 18/move MonaCute 0 -1 0/showFrame MonaCute 18/pause 500/shake WitchCute 350/pause 500/animate WitchCute false false 350 4 5 6 7 8/pause 1250/warp TristanCute 20 23/pause 500/screenFlash 1/warp TristanCute -1000 -1000/warp GingerCute 20 23/pause 1000/emote MonaCute 16/faceDirection MonaCute 2/speed MonaCute 8/move MonaCute 0 7 2/pause 500/warp MonaCute -1000 -1000/animate GingerCute false true 250 0 1 0 1/playSound cacklingWitch/fade fadeOut/warp WitchCute -1000 -1000/warp GingerCute -1000 -1000/viewport -100 -100/pause 500/stopMusic/changeLocation AnimalShop/warp MisterGinger 4 6/warp Jas 5 5/warp farmer 6 6/viewport 5 7 clamp true/pause 500/emote farmer 16/animate MisterGinger true false 350 23 29 30 31 30 23/pause 500/speak Jas "I told you he was more than just a cat!"/stopAnimation MisterGinger/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "I suppose you've got questions?"/question fork1 "...#What happened next?#How do we break the enchantment?"/fork BreakCurse/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "It hurts to remember... but you've gotta know. You'll help me be strong, won't you kitten?$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Jas 3/emote Jas 20/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 32/pause 500/viewport -100 -100/playMusic AbigailFlute/warp MisterGinger -1000 -1000/warp farmer -1000 -1000/warp Jas -1000 -1000/warp GingerCute -100 -100/animate GingerCute false true 250 0 1 3 12 13 14 15/emote GingerCute 24/speak MisterGinger "The witch didn't leave me there in the cave. No, she took me away and dumped me in the countryside, far from home.$2#$b#I could barely remember who I was, who I had been.$2#$b#There was one memory that I clung to, however. Her.#$b#Mona. My beloved.$2#$b#I learned to hunt, and to follow the tingle in my whiskers..."/changeLocation Town/viewport -100 -100/warp MarnShane 47 88/stopAnimation GingerCute/warp GingerCute 45 91/showFrame GingerCute 12/speak MisterGinger "...but when I finally found my way home, I was too late.$2"/playMusic desolate/viewport 45 89 true/pause 2500/animate MarnShane false false 450 0 1 2/showFrame MarnShane 2/pause 2500/animate GingerCute false false 350 16 17 18 19 19 19/pause 2000/showFrame GingerCute 19/fade/viewport -100 -100/pause 1000/warp MarnShane -1000 -1000/speak MisterGinger "But within the darkness, there was one bright spark.#$b#Her daughter.#$b#My Jas."/stopMusic/warp MarnCute 49 33 2 false/showFrame MarnCute 0/warp JasCute 50 33/warp GingerCute 50 37/showFrame JasCute 0/pause 500/viewport -100 -100/fade/viewport 50 34 true/pause 1000/animate GingerCute false false 250 12 13 14 15/pause 1000/showFrame JasCute 1/emote JasCute 20/pause 500/textAboveHead JasCute "Kitty!"/pause 500/showFrame GingerCute 0/pause 500/faceDirection GingerCute 0/pause 500/animate JasCute false false 250 1 2 3/emote GingerCute 16/pause 500/move GingerCute 0 -3 2/showFrame Jas 2/showFrame GingerCute 18/pause 500/faceDirection MarnCute 1/pause 250/emote GingerCute 20/emote MarnCute 32/pause 1000/viewport -100 -100/speak MisterGinger "And from that day on, you stole my heart, Jas.#$b#I might not have been able to be your father, but I could be your friend.#$b#And help you grow and flourish, watch you become bold and smart, and so very kind too. Your mother would've been so proud, kitten.$2"/pause 500/changeLocation AnimalShop/warp MisterGinger 4 6/warp Jas 5 5/warp farmer 6 6/viewport 11 11/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 20/emote Jas 20/pause 1500/faceDirection Jas 1/speak Jas "See farmer @! We've got to break the curse. You'll help us right?"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/switchEvent BreakCurse
Entries.BreakCurse: pause 500/speak Jas "I've been reading up heaps and heaps about enchantments, and the stories all say love breaks spells!#$b#But my love isn't enough...$s#$b#I know you love Mr Ginger almost as much as I do."/pause 500/emote farmer 28/speak Jas "Oh, I don't mean the kissy-kissy kind of love!$1#$b#I mean, like the bestest and bestest of friends, who'd do anything for each other: like Vinny and me."/playSound cat/pause 500/speak Jas "Yes, really! We would!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Jas "How do we use our love to break the enchantment? I don't know...$3"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Nor do I...$2#$b#But Ras'll help us.$4"/pause 500/speak Jas "You mean that weird man in the tower? Aunt Marnie said to stay away from him... he scares me!$3#$b#But you'll talk to him, won't you farmer @?"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/Message "I wonder if anyone else remembers Tristan?"/pause 1000/end
Entries.5295002/A TristanReturns/e 5295000/t 170: 50s/11 13/Marnie 13 14 2 farmer 13 16 0 Jas 2 7 3 MisterGinger 3 7 3 Shane -100 -100 0/addConversationTopic TristanShaneTruce 7/skippable/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "'...and when morning dawned, there at the foot of the bed, slept not a small black cat, but a beautiful princess.'"/pause 500/emote Jas 56/pause 1500/speak Jas "...And they all lived happily ever after."/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "They did indeed. Now, it's time to sleep, kitten.$4"/pause 500/speak Jas "Okay. Goodnight Dad."/pause 500/showFrame Jas 25/emote MisterGinger 20/playSound doorClose/warp Shane 13 19/move Shane 0 -1 0/faceDirection farmer 2/textAboveHead Marnie "Hi Shane."/textAboveHead Shane "Hey. Jas awake?"/move Shane -7 0 0 true/faceDirection farmer 0/advancedMove MisterGinger false 3 0 0 4/pause 1000/move Shane 0 -3 0/doAction 6 12/playSound doorOpen/move MisterGinger 0 1 2/pause 500/jump Shane 5/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Hello Shane"/move Shane 1 0 3/emote Shane 12/move MisterGinger 0 3 1/speak Shane "You've got some gall waltzing back into her life and acting as if you live here. Like you didn't abandon her.$2"/shake MisterGinger 240/speak MisterGinger "Abandon her? I've been here since she was a toddler, Shane.$5#$b#And I would've been here earlier... if I'd been able.$2"/speak Shane "Oh yeah, that's right? Because the wicked witch turned you into a cat.$5#$b#What did you do with Mr Ginger, Tristan? I... I hope you didn't hurt him.$2"/speak MisterGinger "Hurt him? Oh Shane, what'll it take to make you believe us?$2"/move MisterGinger -1 0 1/speak MisterGinger "We should've invited you, you could've seen it with your own eyes.#$b#Hard to argue with that.$2"/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/speak MisterGinger "I tried to help you, you know. But there's only so much I could do with four paws.$2#$b#And dropping dead mice in your beer and pushing cans off the table wasn't enough of a hint.$2"/emote Shane 16/speak Shane "Cats are jerks. That doesn't prove anything.$5"/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "She'd read to me, and we'd pretend to be wild things. She loves monsters, even back when the dark scared her.#$b#Her favorite color is green. She loves melon cake, and fairy roses, and made me promise to never hunt blue jays cos of her friend, Jeremy. As if I'd ever do anything to upset her!"/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "What happened between us? We were best friends... Roomies... Blood brothers! And now it's like we're strangers.$2"/speak Shane "What happened? YOU dated my sister. And you abandoned her... Abandoned us.$2"/shake Shane 300/jump MisterGinger 3/move MisterGinger 1 0 1/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "I miss her too, Shane. Like an ache in my heart that nothing'll ever fill.#$b#It was easier, as a cat... They don't feel the way people do.#$b#Jas's my daughter, Shane. And I want to be her dad... but I'm never going to take her away from you. I promise.#$b#A lot of kids have two parents, after all; some even have two dads.#$b#But I'd rather be the kind that actually talk to each other.$2#$b#So... truce?"/faceDirection Shane 3/emote Shane 40/pause 1000/textAboveHead Shane "Truce"/animate Shane true true 1000 26 26/speak MisterGinger "I missed you, Shane.$2"/end

Entries.5295005/e 5295003/k 5295000/p Evelyn: jaunty/11 17/Evelyn 7 19 2 farmer 9 24 0 Jas 1 20 1 MisterGinger 2 17 2 George 16 22 0/skippable/animate MisterGinger false false 120 23 23 29 29 30 30 31 31 30 30 23 23 27/pause 500/speak Evelyn "Why, hello dear! Please, come in."/move farmer 0 -5 3/faceDirection Evelyn 1/emote farmer 32/move Evelyn -3 0 1 true/move farmer -4 0 3 true/pause 500/speak Evelyn "Today seems to be the day of visitors! Jasmine mentioned you might drop by."/pause 500/speak Jas "Hello farmer @! Granny's telling me all about my parents, and there's stuff you should know too.$4#$b#Plus cookies!$1"/speak Evelyn "Yes, please do join us.#$b#I'll get you some tea.$1"/emote farmer 40/speak Evelyn "No, please, I insist! It's so rare that I have guests to fuss over!$3"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/move Evelyn 0 -2 0/move farmer 0 1 3/pause 500/playSound wateringCan/pause 500/faceDirection Evelyn 2/move Evelyn 0 2 2/pause 500/farmerEat 614/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 3/move Evelyn -1 0 2/pause 500/speak Jas "Now Granny, you were telling me about my dad?"/stopMusic/playSound cat/pause 500/faceDirection Evelyn 0/pause 500/animate MisterGinger false false 120 56 56 57 57 58 58 59 59 58 58 56 27/faceDirection Evelyn 2/pause 500/playMusic echos/speak Evelyn "Yes, young Tristan. Quite the charming rogue, he was. Why, he probably got community service even more than Sam.$1"/pause 500/showFrame MisterGinger 27/faceDirection Jas 0/pause 500/faceDirection Jas 1/pause 500/speak Evelyn "And Mona... oh, she had a look like butter wouldn't melt in her mouth, but behind that was a quick tongue and a sharp mind.$1#$b#They were always giving our good Mayor quite the run around!$1#$b#But most of their pranks were in good fun. Although not always appreciated.$2"/pause 500/speak Evelyn "When Tristan signed up at the Guild, it came as no surprise. He had quite the adventurous spirit, and even in those days, sinister beings lurked beneath the earth.$2"/emote farmer 8/speak Evelyn "Oh, don't be too surprised dear, it's no secret that... something ... moved in, when we humans moved out.$2#$b#George might tell you it's all superstitious nonsense, but he didn't grow up here. Not like I did.$2#$b#Yes, there is magic - both dark and light - at work in Stardew Valley.$1"/playSound cat/pause 500/faceDirection Evelyn 0/speak Evelyn "(laughs) Even the cat believes me. Then again, you're more than just a cat, aren't you, Wilson."/playSound cat/pause 500/speak Evelyn "You're her protector."/pause 500/move MisterGinger 0 2 2/showFrame MisterGinger 27/faceDirection Evelyn 3/pause 500/speak Evelyn "I had a cat friend like you once too... but I digress."/faceDirection Evelyn 2/faceDirection MisterGinger 3 true/faceDirection Jas 0 true/pause 500/faceDirection Jas 1/speak MisterGinger "I sincerely doubt he was anything like me.$1#$b#But go on, tell us more about how brave and charming Tristan was.$4"/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/pause 500/textAboveHead Jas "(giggles)"/pause 500/speak Evelyn "We were all devastated when we lost Tristan to the mines...$2"/pause 500/playSound cat/speak Evelyn "But now is not the time for sorrow, now we must remember the happier times.#$b#You know, Mona used to help me in the gardens."/pause 500/faceDirection Evelyn 3/speak Evelyn "She loved the fairy rose too, my dear. We planted them in the hope that the fairies would come visit."/emote Evelyn 16/speak Evelyn "Which reminds me...$3"/emote Jas 56/move Evelyn 0 -2 0/textAboveHead Evelyn "Now..."/textAboveHead Evelyn "Where were they?"/move Evelyn -1 0 0/pause 1000/playSound openChest/pause 500/textAboveHead Evelyn "Here they are!"/faceDirection Evelyn 2/addObject 2 15 425 1/playSound discoverMineral/pause 1000/removeSprite 2 15/move MisterGinger -1 0 2/move Evelyn 0 2 3/speak Jas "Farmer @ should plant them Granny.$1"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Evelyn "As you wish, my dear.$1"/faceDirection Evelyn 1/move Evelyn 2 0 2/pause 500/speak Evelyn "Plant them with love, and they shall flourish.[425]$3#$b#And maybe you'll even get a special visitor!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/faceDirection Evelyn 3/pause 500/speak Evelyn "Now Jasmine, I have some photographs around here. Would you like to see them?"/speak Jas "Oh, yes please, Granny!$3"/pause 1000/fade/end warpout/

Entries.5295006/e 5295003/k 5295000/t 1200 2400: WizardSong/-100 -100/farmer 8 22 0 MisterGinger 8 20 2 Wizard 8 5 0/addConversationTopic Tristan_Spell/skippable/addLantern 735 3 5 3/playSound doorOpen/pause 500/playSound woodyStep/viewport 7 18 true/pause 500/move Wizard -3 0 0 true/jump MisterGinger 3/pause 500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "You're here!"/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/move Wizard 3 0 0/pause 500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Come on"/pause 500/move MisterGinger 0 -9 0 true/advancedMove farmer false 0 -9 -1 0 0 -1/viewport move 0 -5 2000 true/pause 1500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/speak Wizard "Ah, greetings to you, @. And you, Trix."/pause 1500/playSound cat/stopAdvancedMoves/move farmer 0 -1 0/speak Wizard "So Trix has deigned to share his secret with you, @. And I would assume, from your presence here, that you intend to aid him in these endeavors?"/pause 500/move MisterGinger 0 -5 0/speak MisterGinger "Of course he has, Ras.^Of course she has, Ras."/emote farmer 60/move farmer 0 -5 0/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 500/speak Wizard "And you have come to enlist my assistance?"/pause 500/playSound cat/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/speak Wizard "Trix, are you sure this is what you want? To be human again?"/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 40/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 0 true/faceDirection farmer 0 true/speak MisterGinger "Yes Ras, it's time. I'm ready. We're ready.$3"/pause 500/move Wizard -3 0 0/speak Wizard "(mumbles) I can't help you."/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 12/speed MisterGinger 5/move MisterGinger 0 -1 3/speed MisterGinger 5/move MisterGinger -2 0 3/faceDirection farmer 3/speak MisterGinger "Can't?$2#$b#Or won't?$5"/pause 500/speak Wizard "I have explained this to you before, Trix. I am unable to act against enchantments that relate to ... her."/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "I know...$2"/move Wizard 0 1 1/pause 500/speak Wizard "I cannot. But you can, @."/emote farmer 16/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/showFrame MisterGinger 27/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "#$q 5295060 null#Will you help me?#$r 5295061 100 BreakSpell_Yes1#Absolutely!#$r 5295061 50 BreakSpell_Yes2#I suppose so.#$r 5295062 -500 BreakSpell_No#I'd rather not."/pause 500/fork 5295061 BreakSpell_Continue/pause 500/move MisterGinger 0 2 3/pause 500/animate MisterGinger false false 250 20 21/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/pause 500/move MisterGinger 2 0 2/move MisterGinger 0 17 0 true/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Wizard "Let me guess, @. You love him too much as a cat?"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Wizard "Trix - Tristan - has been waiting a long time. He has watched his daughter grow up, unable to hold her in his arms, unable to teach her how to ride a bike or fly a kite."/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/speak Wizard "We have that in common, he and I... but in my case, I cast the dice and rolled my fate.#$b#For Tristan it was different."/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "I know that you love him, @, and it is hard to imagine him as anything more than a cat.#$b#But I shall impart the knowledge upon you, in case you reconsider.#$b#And if you do not? Well, I am sure he shall forgive you."/switchEvent BreakSpell_Continue2
Entries.BreakSpell_Continue: pause 500/speak MisterGinger "So what do we do, Ras?"/pause 500/move Wizard 0 -1 0/speak Wizard "There's a book here somewhere...#$b#Right, here it is!"/playSound shwip/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/move Wizard 0 1 1/playSound newRecipe/speak Wizard "To break an enchantment, the first requirement is, as I am sure young Jas has thus informed you, love.#$b##$b#And, as fond of you as I am, Trix, my affections never run that deep. But yours do, yes? You love each other?"/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/emote farmer 20/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 32/speak MisterGinger "You're not about to pronounce us man and wife, are you?$1"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Wizard "Don't be foolish. True love runs far deeper, far stronger than mere instinctual attraction.#$b#It is a force. But a force requires focus, and it requires tributes."/pause 500/speak Wizard "There is a pool, hidden in the secret woods. Its waters are rumored to rejuvenate and restore.#$b#Travel there beneath the moon's gaze, and cast your tributes into the water."/pause 500/playSound cacklingWitch/pause 500/shake MisterGinger 250/emote Wizard 12/pause 500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Tributes?"/pause 500/speak Wizard "I cannot tell you much more. It... I am forbidde-.#$b#But three tributes. Items with meaning..."/pause 500/playSound cacklingWitch/shake Wizard 1000/pause 500/speak Wizard "You should go now."/move farmer -1 0 3/emote farmer 8/speak Wizard "Please, just go. I... I shall be fine."/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/pause 1000/end dialogue Wizard "I am sorry I can be of no further assistance, @. I have already said too much, and I am sure shall be punished in my dreams.#$b#Good luck to you."
Entries.BreakSpell_Continue2: pause 500/pause 500/move Wizard 0 -1 0/speak Wizard "There's a book here somewhere...#$b#Right, here it is!"/playSound shwip/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/move Wizard 0 1 1/playSound newRecipe/speak Wizard "To break an enchantment, the first requirement is, as I am sure young Jas has thus informed you, love.#$b#True love runs far deeper, far stronger than mere instinctual attraction.#$b#It is a force. But a force requires focus, and it requires tributes."/pause 500/speak Wizard "There is a pool, hidden in the secret woods. Its waters are rumored to rejuvenate and restore.#$b#Travel there beneath the moon's gaze, and cast your tributes into the water."/pause 500/playSound cacklingWitch/pause 500/emote Wizard 12/pause 500/speak Wizard "I cannot tell you much more. It... I am forbidde-.#$b#But three tributes. Items with meaning..."/pause 500/playSound cacklingWitch/shake Wizard 1000/pause 500/speak Wizard "You should go now."/move farmer -1 0 3/emote farmer 8/speak Wizard "Please, just go. I... I shall be fine."/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/end dialogue Wizard "I hope you have pondered the dilemma,@. I'm sorry I can be of no further assistance.#$b#I've already said too much, and I am sure shall be punished in my dreams.#$b#Good luck to you."

Entries.5295007/e 5295006/k 5295000: XOR/7 6/Hekate 7 7 3 farmer 6 12 0/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 1 0 0/pause 500/faceDirection Hekate 2/pause 500/emote Hekate 12/pause 500/textAboveHead Hekate "You!"/pause 500/jump farmer 5/emote farmer 16/pause 500/move Hekate 0 2 2/pause 500/speak Hekate "You've been talking to him, haven't you? That pretentious fool in the tower.$a"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Hekate "You've been speaking to the cat as well. Haven't you?"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/emote Hekate 28/pause 500/speak Hekate "I suppose you want me to break the curse?"/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Hekate "Oh... let me think about it..."/pause 500/emote Hekate 40/pause 1000/textAboveHead Hekate "NO."/pause 500/jump farmer 5/pause 500/emote farmer 12/pause 500/speak Hekate "Oh, it was an accident of course, I'll admit to that. They're rare, but they do happen.$a"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Hekate "Heard that line before have you? Oh, it's one of HIS favorites.$a#$b#That and the mystical ways of the elementals. Pah! It's a wonder I put up with him for so long.$a#$b#The man's a fool and you are too, for thinking I might help you."/pause 500/emote farmer 12/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/emote Hekate 40/pause 1000/textAboveHead Hekate "Okay. Fine."/pause 500/jump farmer 3/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak Hekate "I brushed my hands free of him years ago, and am all the better for it.#$b#I'm not going to help you, but I could offer you some...advice."/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Hekate "He's told you, no doubt, about casting tribute into a magical pond by moonlight, and blah blah blah, all that romantic magical mumbo-jumbo?"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Hekate "Did you ever play that childhood guessing game: Animal, Vegetable, Mineral? There's power in the nonsense, mortal."/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Hekate "Oh, don't look at me like that. If you can't figure it out yourself, then you're more ignorant than you look.$a#$b#And that's pretty ignorant indeed.$1#$b#Now, are you going to buy something or are you just wasting my time?"/pause 500/emote farmer 12/pause 1000/end
Entries.5295008/e 5295007/e 5295000/A TristanRet: XOR/7 6/Hekate 10 5 2 MisterGinger 8 11 3 farmer 7 11 1/skippable/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Yes, I know. This is a terrible idea, @. But I'm not going to let you talk me out of it."/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "I do appreciate your support, and if she turns me back... well, I'll have my claws and teeth.$6#$b#And I'll be sure to use them.$5"/pause 500/move MisterGinger 2 0 0/move farmer 2 0 0/move MisterGinger 0 -4 0 true/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Hello ... Hekate, yes?$2"/pause 500/emote Hekate 40/pause 500/textAboveHead Hekate "Yes?"/pause 2500/jump Hekate 5/pause 500/emote Hekate 16/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Ah, recognized me, have you?$5"/pause 500/emote Hekate 28/pause 1500/move Hekate 0 -1 2/speak Hekate "Don't you dare try and hurt me. I'm a powerful witch you know, and you're a mere mortal.$a#$b#You and your little girlfriend were meddling with things you didn't understand.$a#$b#I had every right to defend my property!$a#$b#I doubt you were even aware of the damage you caused.$a"/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 8/pause 1500/speak MisterGinger "The damage WE caused? What about the damage you caused?$a#$b#You turned me into a cat!$2"/pause 500/speak Hekate "Yes, I did. And it wasn't so bad, was it? You still got to watch your girl grow up, after all."/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 12/pause 1500/faceDirection MisterGinger 3 true/faceDirection farmer 1 true/speak MisterGinger "That's... That's not the point!"/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/speak MisterGinger "I couldn't be with Mona and... and she died.$2"/stopMusic/pause 1000/textAboveHead Hekate "Oh..."/pause 2500/playMusic desolate/speak Hekate "Well yes, that is unfortunate.$2#$b#But I'm not sure what you expect me to do about it. I can't turn back time, and I'm certainly not about to raise the dead.$2#$b#That never goes well.$2"/emote MisterGinger 40/pause 2500/emote Hekate 12/pause 2500/textAboveHead Hekate "Fine."/pause 1500/faceDirection Hekate 0/pause 500/move Hekate -2 0 1/move Hekate 2 0 2/pause 500/move Hekate 0 1 2/speak Hekate "I do owe you an apology. I'm sorry I caused you grief.$s"/pause 1500/speak MisterGinger "And I'm sorry we broke into your house.$2"/pause 2500/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Come on, @. Let's go home."/pause 500/move MisterGinger 0 4 2 true/move farmer 0 4 2 true/speak Hekate "You couldn't have saved her, you know.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "I know... but I could've been there, at the end. To hold her hand, and tell her I loved her.$2"/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/emote farmer 20/pause 500/end dialogue Hekate "I actually am sorry, you know.#$b#Not that I expect him to believe that.$2sd"

Entries.5295000/i 577/i 595/i 795/e 5295003/t 23: woodsTheme/24 26/farmer 39 25 0 MisterGinger -1000 -1000 3 Jas -1000 -1000 3 Wizard -1000 -1000 2/removeItem 577/removeItem 795/removeItem 595/addConversationTopic TristanReturns 7/addMailReceived Tristan_Returns/skippable/addLantern 735 32 22 4/pause 500/move farmer -8 0 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/playSound cat/jump farmer 3/speed farmer 3/move farmer 0 2 1/pause 500/warp MisterGinger 39 25/move MisterGinger -2 0 3/warp Jas 39 26/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Yes, I know... we're late. You can blame Marnie for that..."/pause 500/speak Jas "Mr. Marlon came over! He said there'd been void activity in the area.$3#$b#But I think he just really wanted to see Aunt Marnie.$1#$b#He's nice... even if he does kill monsters.$3"/pause 500/move MisterGinger -5 0 3 true/move Jas -5 0 3 true/pause 1500/speak MisterGinger "Did you bring the tributes?"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 2/emote farmer 32/pause 500/jump MisterGinger 3/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "So we... what? Throw them in the lake?"/move MisterGinger -3 0 3/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Then I... I jump in...$2"/shake MisterGinger 240/pause 500/move Jas -4 0 3/move Jas 0 -1 3/pause 500/speak Jas "It's okay to be frightened... But it'll be okay, I know it!$4"/pause 500/pause 500/showFrame MisterGinger 20/pause 500/showFrame MisterGinger 21/pause 500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Frightened?"/pause 1500/speak MisterGinger "I'm not frightened! I just don't like water!$2"/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/speak MisterGinger "Well, go on then, what are you waiting for?$3"/pause 500/jump farmer 3/move farmer -2 0 3/animate farmer true true 500 30/addObject 29 22 595 1/speak Jas "It's a fairy rose! Cos Mom loved them!"/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/animate farmer true false 250 31 32 33/removeSprite 29 22/playSound dropItemInWater/jump MisterGinger/pause 500/glow 1 80 80 true/move Jas 0 2 3/move Jas -1 0 3/textAboveHead Jas "Wow!"/pause 500/shake MisterGinger 340/pause 500/animate farmer true true 500 30/addObject 29 22 795 1/speak MisterGinger "A Void Salmon... for her. The witch. Ugh, I couldn't ever eat those things.$2"/pause 500/animate farmer true false 250 31 32 33/removeSprite 29 22/playSound dropItemInWater/pause 500/glow 80 80 1 true/pause 500/textAboveHead Jas "It's working!"/pause 500/animate farmer true true 500 30/addObject 29 22 577 1/speak MisterGinger "And the focus."/pause 500/animate farmer true false 250 31 32 33/removeSprite 29 22/playSound dropItemInWater/glow 80 1 80 true/pause 500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "*Gulp*"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Well, here goes nothing? If I don't come out... well, it's been nice knowing you, @.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 2 true/faceDirection Jas 0 true/speak MisterGinger "Whether I come out of there on two legs or four... I love you kitten."/emote Jas 20/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/jump MisterGinger 7/screenFlash 1 1/playSound healSound/fade/viewport -100 -100/move MisterGinger -2 0 2/faceDirection Jas 3/warp MisterGinger -1000 -1000/addTemporaryActor Tristan 16 32 25 25 1 true/swimming Tristan/faceDirection farmer 3/viewport 24 26/pause 500/textAboveHead Jas "It worked!"/emote farmer 16 true/pause 500/faceDirection Tristan 1/speak Tristan "Um... hi. Err, I don't suppose anyone thought to bring a towel, did they?"/pause 1500/playSound wand/warp Wizard 27 22/showFrame Tristan 8/faceDirection Jas 0 true/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Wizard "Hello Tristan, it's good to see you again."/move farmer 0 -2 3/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "I shall take it from here, @. You should accompany Miss Jasmine home. She's up past her bedtime."/pause 500/jump Jas 5/speed Jas 3/move Jas 0 -2 0/emote Jas 12/speak Jas "That's not fair! He's MY Dad!$2#$b#He should come home with me!$4"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/emote Wizard 40/pause 500/speak Wizard "There are few things in life that are fair, child. Consider this an early lesson."/move Tristan 2 0 1/pause 500/faceDirection Jas 3/pause 500/speak Tristan "It's okay, kitten. I'm happy to be back again and to finally meet you as me.#$b#But it's really late, and I'm sure Aunt Marnie's had enough surprises tonight already.$1#$b# I'll be okay. Ras and I have a lot to catch up on. I'll come and see you in the morning, okay?$4"/pause 500/textAboveHead Jas "Promise?"/pause 1500/textAboveHead Tristan "Promise"/pause 1500/emote Jas 40/pause 1500/textAboveHead Jas "Okay"/pause 500/faceDirection Jas 0/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Jas "Can you please take me home, farmer @?"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/emote Tristan 20/pause 1000/fade/viewport -100 -100/stopSwimming Tristan/end invisibleWarpOut MisterGinger

Entries.5295010/n Tristan_BakedFishGift/e 529500: archaeo/24 35/farmer 26 28 2 MisterGinger 27 35 1 Willy -100 -100 2/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 0 5 2/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Ah, hello @! Today feels like a good day for redemption, don't you think?"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Did you bring the fish?"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 1/pause 500/playSound purchase/removeItem 198/money 500/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Thank you, @.#$b#Well, here goes nothing..."/pause 500/move MisterGinger 4 0 3/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Come on."/jump farmer 4/move MisterGinger 0 -1 0/pause 500/playSound doorOpen/warp MisterGinger -100 -100/speed farmer 5/speed farmer 5/move farmer 4 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/playSound doorOpen/globalFade/viewport -100 -100/changeLocation FishShop/warp Willy 4 4/warp MisterGinger 5 9/viewport 7 5/pause 500/textAboveHead Willy "Hello Tristan!"/pause 500/move MisterGinger 0 -2 0/pause 500/speak Willy "It's good to have you back, lad. And how can I help you today?#$b#Taken up fishing, have you?$1"/pause 500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Not exactly..."/pause 1500/playSound doorOpen/warp farmer 5 9/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/emote MisterGinger 32/textAboveHead Willy "And welcome!"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer -1 0 0/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/speak MisterGinger "Actually Willy... I came to apologize.$3"/emote MisterGinger 28/pause 1500/speak Willy "Apologize? Whatever for?$2"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "For stealing your lunch."/pause 500/speak Willy "Stealing my lunch? I don't know what you're on about lad?"/move MisterGinger 0 -1 0/addObject 4 4 198 1/speak MisterGinger "That day at the beach?#$b#I stole your fish."/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 28/pause 500/emote Willy 40/pause 2000/textAboveHead Willy "Bosun?"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Yeah, that was me... Anyway, I heard you liked baked fish. So..."/pause 500/emote Willy 40/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "I hope you'll forgive me. @ made it."/move MisterGinger 0 1 3/speak MisterGinger "That's why it's not burned.$4"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/speak Willy "I find it hard to believe, lad, but then again, stranger things have happened.#$b#Oh the tales I could tell you about monsters of the deep, and a woman who became a fish... Anyhow...#$b#... thanks Tristan. And thank you, @! This looks delicious.#$b#Apology accepted. And if you ever want to learn how to catch your own, I'd be glad to help.$1"/pause 500/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "You know what? I might just take you up on that offer.$1"/pause 1500/end warpOut

Entries.5295012/n Tristan_MtEvermore/D MisterGin: archaeo/62 35/MisterGinger 64 35 0 farmer 61 41 0/skippable/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 56/pause 500/move farmer 0 -6 1/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/speak MisterGinger "Ah @, you came! Ready to ascend Mt Evermore?$3#$b#I hear the view is quite spectacular!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Right, let's go!"/move farmer 2 0 0/pause 500/move MisterGinger 0 -3 0 true/move farmer 0 -3 0 true/pause 3000/fade/viewport -100 -100/stopMusic/changeToTemporaryMap MtEvermore/viewport -100 -100/warp farmer 15 25/warp MisterGinger 16 25/message "It's a very steep climb!"/pause 500/viewport 16 19 clamp true/ambientLight 50 120 80/move MisterGinger 0 -8 3 true/move farmer 0 -8 1 true/pause 2000/speak MisterGinger "We made it! That was quite a hike, wasn't it?#$b#I'm not sure my legs will ever be the same again.$2"/viewport move 0 -3 3000/move MisterGinger 0 -8 3 true/move farmer 0 -8 0 true/pause 2000/speak MisterGinger "Are you ready for the most spectaular sunset in Ferngill?"/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 8/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/pause 1000/jump MisterGinger 5/screenFlash 1/emote MisterGinger 16/faceDirection MisterGinger 3 true/faceDirection farmer 1 true/playSound thunder/speak MisterGinger "Quick! The cabin!$7"/speed MisterGinger 5/move MisterGinger 0 8 2 true/pause 500/speed farmer 5/move farmer 0 6 2/fade/viewport -100 -100/warp MisterGinger -1000 -1000/warp farmer -1000 -1000/playSound doorOpen/speak MisterGinger "In here!"/pause 500/playSound doorClose/playSound rain/fade/viewport -100 -100/changeToTemporaryMap MtCabin/viewport -100 -100/warp farmer 5 8/warp MisterGinger 4 9/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/addLantern 735 6 6 1/viewport 5 6/ambientLight 200 200 200/speak MisterGinger "Phew, that was close! I hate water.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 3 true/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/move MisterGinger 0 -1 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak MisterGinger "Rustic, isn't it?"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Sorry @. I didn't mean to drag you all the way up here and trap you in a storm.$2#$b#This is very much not my idea of a good time.#$b#$q 529599 null#Oh, you're shivering...#$b#$r 529598 50 Tristan_Snuggle#We could snuggle for warmth#$r 529597 50 Tristan_Fire#We should light the fire"/fork 529597 Tristan_FireLight/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Oh!$7#$b#Come here, I don't have fur anymore, but I'll keep you warm."/faceDirection farmer 1/positionOffset farmer -10 0/showFrame MisterGinger 28/speak MisterGinger "I've got a confession to make, @. I know we said that 'love' didn't have to be about all that sappy-kissy stuff, and that's true.$3#$b#But since I've been back as, well, myself, I'm starting to feel more too.$4#$b#And human emotion is far more complicated than feline!$3#$b#But I have feelings for you, @. Like you've helped fill a place in my heart that I'd lost.$4"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "$q -1 null#...$4#$r -1 0 Tristan_cabin1#I feel the same way about you.#$r -1 -25 Tristan_cabin2#I care for you too, but not in that way."/fork Tristan_FireLight/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 20/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/positionOffset MisterGinger 10 0/textAboveHead MisterGinger "<"/pause 2000/end

Entries.Tristan_FireLight: pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Let's see if I can find some matches..."/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/pause 500/fade/viewport -100 -100/warp MisterGinger 3 6/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/warp farmer 4 6/addLantern 114 3 4 2/addTemporaryActor MtFire 16 16 3 4 2 false/positionOffset MtFire 0 10 2/animate MtFire false true 1000 0 1 2 3/viewport 5 6/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "That's much better. Now, it looks like we might be here for a while... Would you like me to tell you a story?"/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Once upon a time, in a kingdom far, far from here, lived a queen who had, as her companion, a most magnificant cat..."/fade/viewport -100 -100/end dialogue MisterGinger "Sorry that sunset didn't go as planned... we'll have to do it again sometime?"

Entries.BreakCurse: pause 500/speak Jas "I've been reading up heaps and heaps about enchantments, and the stories all say love breaks spells!#$b#But my love isn't enough...$s#$b#I know you love Mr Ginger almost as much as I do"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/speak Jas "Oh, I don't mean the kissy-kissy kind of love!$1#$b#I mean, like the bestest and bestest of friends, who'd do anything for each other: like Vinny and me.#$b#Yes, really!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Jas "How do we use our love to break the enchantment? I don't know..."/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Nor do I...$2#$b#But the Goddess will help us!$5"/pause 500/speak Jas "You mean that beautiful woman in the forest?$3#$b#You'll talk to her, won't you farmer @?"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/end

Entries.5295006/e 5295003/k 5295000/t 1200 2400: WizardSong/-100 -100/farmer 8 22 0 MisterGinger 8 20 2 Wizard 6 15 0/addConversationTopic Tristan_Spell/skippable/addLantern 735 3 5 3/playSound doorOpen/pause 500/playSound woodyStep/viewport 7 18 true/pause 500/move Wizard -3 0 0 true/jump MisterGinger 3/pause 500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "You're here!"/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/move Wizard 1 0 0/pause 500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Come on"/pause 500/move MisterGinger 0 -5 3 true/move farmer 0 -6 3 true/pause 1500/faceDirection Wizard 1/pause 500/speak Wizard "Ah, greetings to you, @. And you, Trix."/pause 1500/playSound cat/move farmer -1 0 3/speak Wizard "So Trix has deigned to share his secret with you, @. And I would assume, from your presence here, that you intend to aid him in these endeavors?"/pause 500/move MisterGinger -3 0 3/speak MisterGinger "Of course he has, Ras.^Of course she has, Ras."/emote farmer 60/move farmer -2 0 3/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 500/speak Wizard "And you have come to enlist my assistance?"/pause 500/playSound cat/faceDirection Wizard 1/pause 500/speak Wizard "Trix, are you sure this is what you want? To be human again?"/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 40/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 3 true/faceDirection farmer 3 true/speak MisterGinger "Yes Ras, it's time. I'm ready. We're ready.$3"/pause 500/move Wizard 0 2 2/speak Wizard "(mumbles) I can't help you."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/emote MisterGinger 12/speed MisterGinger 5/move MisterGinger 1 0 3/speed MisterGinger 5/move MisterGinger 0 2 2/speed MisterGinger 5/move MisterGinger -1 0 3/faceDirection farmer 2/speak MisterGinger "Can't?$2#$b#Or won't?$5"/pause 500/speak Wizard "I have explained this to you before, Trix. I am unable to act against enchantments that relate to ... her."/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "I know...$2"/move Wizard 0 -1 1/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Wizard "I cannot. But you can, @."/emote farmer 16/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "#$q 5295060 null#Will you help me?#$r 5295061 100 BreakSpell_Yes1#Absolutely!#$r 5295061 50 BreakSpell_Yes2#I suppose so.#$r 5295062 -500 BreakSpell_No#I'd rather not."/pause 500/fork 5295061 BreakSpell_Continue/pause 500/move MisterGinger 0 2 3/pause 500/animate MisterGinger false false 250 20 21/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/pause 500/move MisterGinger 4 0 2/move MisterGinger 0 15 0 true/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Wizard "Let me guess, @. You love him too much as a cat?"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Wizard "Trix - Tristan - has been waiting a long time. He has watched his daughter grow up, unable to hold her in his arms, unable to teach her how to ride a bike or fly a kite."/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/speak Wizard "We have that in common, he and I... but in my case, I cast the dice and rolled my fate.#$b#For Tristan it was different."/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "I know that you love him, @, and it is hard to imagine him as anything more than a cat.#$b#But I shall impart the knowledge upon you, in case you reconsider.#$b#And if you do not? Well, I am sure he shall forgive you."/switchEvent BreakSpell_Continue2
Entries.BreakSpell_Continue: pause 500/speak MisterGinger "So what do we do, Ras?"/pause 500/move Wizard -2 0 3/speak Wizard "There's a book here somewhere...#$b#Right, here it is!"/playSound shwip/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/move Wizard 2 0 1/playSound newRecipe/speak Wizard "To break an enchantment, the first requirement is, as I am sure young Jas has thus informed you, love.#$b#And, as fond of you as I am, Trix, my affections never run that deep. But yours do, yes? You love each other?"/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/emote farmer 20/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 32/speak MisterGinger "You're not about to pronounce us man and wife, are you?$1"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Wizard "Don't be foolish. True love runs far deeper, far stronger than mere instinctual attraction.#$b#It is a force. But a force requires focus, and it requires tributes."/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/pause 500/speak Wizard "There is a pool, hidden in the secret woods. Its waters are rumored to rejuvenate and restore.#$b#Travel there beneath the moon's gaze, and cast your tributes into the water."/pause 500/playSound cacklingWitch/pause 500/shake MisterGinger 250/emote Wizard 12/pause 500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Tributes?"/pause 500/speak Wizard "I cannot tell you much more. It... I am forbidde-.#$b#But three tributes. Items with meaning..."/pause 500/playSound cacklingWitch/shake Wizard 1000/pause 500/speak Wizard "You should go now."/emote farmer 8/speak Wizard "Please, just go. I... I shall be fine."/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/pause 1000/end dialogue Wizard "I am sorry I can be of no further assistance, @. I have already said too much, and I am sure shall be punished in my dreams.#$b#Good luck to you."
